articles.description: England grind down defending champions New Zealand to make history and reach a first Netball World Cup final.
articles.title: England beat New Zealand to reach first World Cup final

articles.description: Champions Celtic and Ross County kick off the new Scottish Premiership season with more SPFL action at 15:00.
articles.title: Celtic v Ross County kicks off Premiership season

articles.description: Denmark striker Rasmus Hojlund joins Manchester United on a five-year deal from Serie A side Atalanta.
articles.title: Man Utd complete £72m signing of striker Hojlund

articles.description: Manchester City sign Croatia centre-back Josko Gvardiol on a five-year deal from RB Leipzig for £77m.
articles.title: Man City sign Croatia defender Gvardiol for £77m

articles.description: Japan take a step closer to a second Women's World Cup title by beating Norway 3-1 to reach the quarter-finals.
articles.title: Japan beat Norway to reach World Cup quarter-finals

articles.description: Watch the moment England beat New Zealand 46-40 in a tense match to reach the Netball World Cup final.
articles.title: 'Tears on court!' - England beat NZ to reach first World Cup final

articles.description: Watch highlights as Japan take a step closer to a second Women's World Cup title as they beat Norway 3-1 and will face either the USA or Sweden in the quarter-finals.
articles.title: Superb Japan into quarter finals after Norway win

articles.description: Watch live coverage from the third day of the 2023 Cycling World Championships in Glasgow.
articles.title: Watch: 2023 Cycling World Championships

articles.description: New Zealand stage a dramatic comeback to beat Australia 23-20 and retain their winning form before the Rugby World Cup.
articles.title: New Zealand fight back for late win over Australia

articles.description: Spain reach the quarter-finals of the Fifa Women's World Cup for the first time after producing an outstanding display of firepower to send Switzerland out.
articles.title: Spain put five past Switzerland to reach last eight
